                              ">
                            Brilho do monitor incomoda? Saiba regular corretamente
                        </h3></div></div></a></div></div></div></div></div><ul class="gui-navigation-dots js-navigation-dots" data-track-action="interacoes"><li class="navigation-dot" data-track-click="subpaginacao"></li></ul></div><a class="showtime__arrow showtime__arrow--left" href="#" data-track-action="interacoes" data-track-click="esquerda" data-track-noninteraction="true"><svg class="showtime__arrow--svg" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 0 30.748 52.669"><path class="showtime__arrow-path gui-fill-primary" d="M0.878,28.455L24.212,51.79c1.172,1.172,3.071,1.172,4.243,0l1.415-1.414c1.171-1.172,1.171-3.071,0-4.242L10.071,26.334L29.87,6.535c1.171-1.172,1.171-3.07,0-4.242l-1.415-1.414c-1.171-1.172-3.071-1.172-4.243,0L0.878,24.213C-0.293,25.385-0.293,27.284,0.878,28.455z"/></svg></a><a class="showtime__arrow showtime__arrow--right" href="#" data-track-action="interacoes" data-track-click="direita" data-track-noninteraction="true"><svg class="showtime__arrow--svg" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 0 30.748 52.669"><path class="showtime__arrow-path gui-fill-primary" d="M29.87,24.214L6.536,0.879c-1.172-1.172-3.071-1.172-4.243,0L0.878,2.293c-1.171,1.172-1.171,3.071,0,4.242l19.799,19.799L0.878,46.134c-1.171,1.171-1.171,3.07,0,4.242l1.415,1.414c1.171,1.172,3.071,1.172,4.243,0L29.87,28.456C31.041,27.284,31.041,25.385,29.87,24.214z"/></svg></a></div></div></div><script>
      var showtimeTimeout = setTimeout(function() {
        new ShowTime(document.querySelector('.showtime__wrapper'));
      }, 200);
    </script></div></div><div class="row"><div class="areatemplate-meio
